column1: Questions
On a scale of 1 to 10, how rested do you feel today?
How many hours of sleep did you get last night?
How many deep breaths did you take when you felt stressed today?
How many times have you laughed today?
How many hours, in a week, do you set aside time for yourself?
How many minutes do you usually spend meditating or reflecting daily
On a scale of 1 to 10, how connected do you feel to others right now?
How many times have you been outside in nature this week?
How many goals did you achieve last month that made you feel proud?
How often do you practice gratitude, in days per week?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your focus today?
How many moments of stillness have you noticed today?
How many minutes have you spent today just being present?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how stressed are you feeling at this moment?
How many hours do you dedicate to self-care each week?
How many new things have you learned this month?
How many books have you read this year?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how balanced does your life feel right now?
How many times a day do you pause and check in with yourself?
How many positive affirmations have you spoken today?
How many times this week have you felt truly joyful?
How many distractions have you faced today?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how fulfilled do you feel at the moment?
How many hours have you spent on hobbies or creative activities this week?
How many times have you said 'no' to something you didn't want to do this week?
How often do you engage in mindful activities like journaling or meditation each week?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how much energy do you have right now?
How many deep conversations have you had this week?
How many times did you practice kindness today?
How many times have you let go of frustration or anger this week?
How many new things did you try this month?
How many hours of quality time did you spend with loved ones this week?
How many times have you stepped out of your comfort zone in the last month?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how motivated do you feel today?
How many acts of self-compassion did you practice today?
How many mindful moments did you experience during your meals today?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how much stress do you feel at work or school right now?
How many goals do you want to achieve this month?
How many compliments have you given to others this week?
How many minutes/hours did you spend outside today?
How many times did you experience self-doubt this week?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your emotional resilience right now?
How many opportunities have you taken to rest in the past week?
How many minutes do you spend on social media each day?
How many times have you practiced mindfulness when interacting with others this week?
How many moments of gratitude have you had today?
How many times have you reflected on your goals and progress
On a scale of 1 to 10, how patient do you feel today?
How many people have you expressed appreciation to this week?
How many times have you said something positive to yourself today?
